Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Maxima sighed. She couldn't wait here like some pathetic dog for Hydras. She 
was a warrior & she would do her duties. 

"Perceptor...Inform me when he comes back online," she glanced at him. 

With that, she turned & left the CR Chamber heading up to the Bridge. 

 

--part1_c1.31b6f035.2be5511c_boundary
